alert.note: Alert for Camp; Franklin; Red River; Titus (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 10:45PM CDT until June 11 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in northeastern Texas... Titus County in northeastern Texas... Central Camp County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1045 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Hagansport, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Pittsburg, Hagansport, Mount Vernon, Bogata, Wilkerson, Cookville, Deport, Winfield, Talco, Miller`s Cove, Rocky Mound, Hopewell, Harts Bluff, Monticello, Cuthand, Roeder, Harvard and Johntown. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
